name: A Night at Home
description:
You have been playing games all afternoon, and have been told to get off the computer. Your reply, "one more game". Your parents have gone to sleep, and your game just finished. You decide to stay awake, after all... it's never just one more game. Will you get caught?

A Night at Home, is an autobiographical experience from my childhood.

Created over three weeks as a student project, it had to fulfil just one restriction - to be playable within five minutes.

If there are any issues, please let me know in the comments.

Contributors

Martyn Evans
